speaker: Help Desk
message: Hi, this is PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1. How may I help you?

speaker: User
message: Hi, if I wish to cite statistics from a journal article, do i have to include a page number in the citation? (even if i didn't quote)

speaker: Help Desk
message: Hi PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1, page number for in-text citation is only required when quotes are used.

speaker: User
message: oh sorry, forgot to mention, the citation style is apa 7th edition

speaker: Help Desk
message: Hence if you did not quote, there is no need to have the page number.

speaker: Help Desk
message: No problem. is there anything else I can help you with?
